CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 11, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "SOUTHERNETTES DANCE - Snapped at the recent spring frolic given by the Southern Club, were the wives of the members who acted as hostesses. in group are Mrs. Rose Milton Johnson, president of the Southernettes, shown seated, center, and Mesdames Pauline Bolden, Marion Hall, Ima Henderson, Sadie Wrenn, Jacqueline Lightfoot, Daisy Duncan, Margaret Page, Margaret Lowry, Zella Hardy, Ivy Johnson, Marion Kyd, Ethel Jackson and Lettie Cissell. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fourteen women, including Pauline Bolden, Marion Hall, Ima Henderson, Sadie Wrenn, Jacqueline Lightfoot, Rose Milton Johnson, Daisy Duncan, Margaret Page, Margaret Lowry, Zella Hardy, Ivy Johnson, Marion Kyd, Ethel Jackson, and Lettie Cissell, posed in ballroom for Southern Club's "Southernette" dance
